title: [普通法bug：未審先坐] 琴日襲警罪不成立既手足，原來未審就還押左三個月

replies.msg:
未審先坐根本係荒謬絕論
系統性地違反人權
而受害者損失亦無法彌補
希望大家關注下「未審先坐」呢個議題
唔好淨係掛住慶祝罪名不成立

琴日林子勤裁判官已講左呢位19歲手足比黑警打成點
當日新聞亦講呢位手足因傷勢嚴重要留院搞到第一次上唔到庭
一個傷勢咁嚴重既人棄保潛逃風險係 高 定係 低？
而手足只係被告襲警 就算成立最多只會判1年
咁要佢未審先還押3個月係比例上合唔合理？
究竟係而家保釋既機制有問題，定係法官有問題？
我相信係both
法官因個人己見/取向/政見就唔比人保釋只會步向黑警化
而唔同法官既準則都唔同亦造成司法不公

最後，我竟然google搵唔到當日邊位裁判官拒絕被告保釋，各位ching搵到可以唔該係到講底


———————————————

元旦警方在旺角驅散人群時，一名19歲少年被指在山東街與通菜街交界襲警，遭制服地上，並有便衣警在附近圍圈防止他人接近，其間一名便衣警不適暈倒。被制服的少年早前被控襲警罪，但因受傷留院，一度缺席聆訊。他昨午被帶上法庭應訊，控方申請押後案件，少年須還柙至3月30日。

案件原本於1月3日首次提堂 ，但被告因留院而缺席聆訊；及至昨午他被帶上法庭，惟警方未有通知傳媒。

【案件編號：WKCC43/20】

專講弱智野
我初初以為佢五毛帶風向

後尾發覺佢真係弱智

quote 段關於bail既judgment比大家睇

https://legalref.judiciary.hk/lrs/common/search/search_result_detail_frame.jsp?DIS=126991&QS=%28Presumption%2Bof%2BBail%29&TP=JU

第14-18段

精華
18. As such, s9D gives rise to a “presumption of bail” which the prosecution has to rebut if they object to bail being granted to the accused. As Zervos J(as he then was) said in HKSAR v Vu Thang Duong[12]:

“The relevant provisions allow the court to take into account a range of relevant matters when deciding whether or not to grant bail. The presumption of bail can be rebutted by the nature of the offence, the risk of danger to the public, or the likelihood that the trial could be affected by the defendant absconding or influencing a witness. An unreasonable delay in custody, in the particular circumstances of the case, may be a factor in favour of bail. Of course, such a factor would be taken into account together with all other relevant factors in deciding whether or not to grant bail.”

正常情況下,除非牽涉嚴重罪行及罪證確鑿
否則法官都應該批出保釋
而實際上係上年反修例之前,好少CASE唔比保釋
可惜而家凡事政治掛帥

第14-18段

精華
18. As such, s9D gives rise to a “presumption of bail” which the prosecution has to rebut if they object to bail being granted to the accused. As Zervos J(as he then was) said in HKSAR v Vu Thang Duong[12]:

“The relevant provisions allow the court to take into account a range of relevant matters when deciding whether or not to grant bail. The presumption of bail can be rebutted by the nature of the offence, the risk of danger to the public, or the likelihood that the trial could be affected by the defendant absconding or influencing a witness. An unreasonable delay in custody, in the particular circumstances of the case, may be a factor in favour of bail. Of course, such a factor would be taken into account together with all other relevant factors in deciding whether or not to grant bail.”

正常情況下,除非牽涉嚴重罪行及罪證確鑿
否則法官都應該批出保釋
而實際上係上年反修例之前,好少CASE唔比保釋
可惜而家凡事政治掛帥
